text: ingan-ege silyeon-i iss-eul ttaeneungidaeeo ttoneun anj-aseo ttoneun seoseo hananimkke guwonhadeola hananim-i geulobuteo silyeon-eul gujehaess-eul ttae geuneun geuege iss-eossdeon silyeon-eul hananimkke gu wonhaji anihaessdeon geoscheoleom gabeolinibulsinjadeul-ui haengdong-eun geudeul-ui myeonjeon-eseo geuleoldeus boil ppun-ila
